name: MindManager XML Map
summary: Learn about .XMMAP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MindManager enables you to create diagrams for brainstorming ideas, planning events, recording meeting notes, and more. When you save a mind map, you can choose between saving it as an MMAP file or an XMMAP file. The advantage of the MMAP binary format is that it requires less storage space. However, the XMMAP XML format is more transportable since other applications more easily read it.
NOTE: Corel Corporation acquired MindManager from Mindjet in 2016.
To create an XMMAP file with MindManager:
Select File → New or New from Template...
Choose MindManager Map (XML) in the format dropdown menu

description: An XMMAP file is a mind map created by Corel MindManager, a visual diagramming application. It contains a diagram consisting of drawn objects, text, images, and other symbols. XMMAP files are similar to .MMAP files but saved in the XML standard instead of the binary MMAP format.

instructions: You can open an XMMAP file with Corel MindManager in Windows and macOS. To open an XMMAP file, select File → Open.... You can also open XMMAP files with the web version of Corel MindManager in a browser.
Corel MindManager can convert XMMAP files to the following formats:
